attributes.description: Stud-Tape™, a no stretch, clear adhesive measuring tape acts as a building guide with incremental markings following construction standards for a variety of projects. The ruled measuring tape adheres along the top plate, with clear markings indicating exactly where studs are to be positioned. This makes it easy for construction crews to create precise layouts for roofs, floors, and wall studs more quickly and accurately than ever before.
attributes.title: Stud-Tape
Stud- Tape Headquarters
attributes.description: Canton, OH is the location of Stud-Tape Headquarters. The company was founded in 2011.
